trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, press the F5 key to run the app.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, press the F5 key to run the app.

trans-unit.source: Log in using the selected identity provider and verify that authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Log in using the selected identity provider and verify that authentication succeeds.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type text in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type text in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.

trans-unit.source: Note that after the insert completes, the app receives a push notification from WNS.
trans-unit.target: Note that after the insert completes, the app receives a push notification from WNS.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Repeat steps 1-3 on a different client device and using a different account when logging in.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) Repeat steps 1-3 on a different client device and using a different account when logging in.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the notification is received only on this device, since the previous device was not tagged with the current user ID.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the notification is received only on this device, since the previous device was not tagged with the current user ID.
